statements: SELECT * FROM transportation_costs;
SELECT shipment_id, cost_per_km, distance_km, weight_kg FROM transportation_costs;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs ORDER BY shipment_id DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, distance_km, weight_kg, cost_per_km FROM transportation_costs WHERE weight_kg > 100;
SELECT shipment_id, distance_km, cost_per_km, weight_kg FROM transportation_costs WHERE distance_km < 500;
SELECT shipment_id, cost_per_km FROM transportation_costs WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY cost_per_km DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, distance_km, weight_kg, cost_per_km FROM transportation_costs WHERE weight_kg BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY distance_km ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE cost_per_km < 0.05 OR weight_kg > 2000 ORDER BY shipment_id;
SELECT shipment_id, distance_km, cost_per_km FROM transportation_costs WHERE shipment_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, weight_kg, cost_per_km FROM transportation_costs WHERE distance_km < 50 AND cost_per_km BETWEEN 0.02 AND 0.04 ORDER BY weight_kg ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE distance < 100
SELECT id, cost FROM transportation_costs WHERE weight > 50
SELECT id, distance, cost FROM transportation_costs WHERE cost BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT * FROM parameters WHERE parameter_name LIKE '%distance%'
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM parameters WHERE parameter_value > 0
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT id, distance, cost FROM transportation_costs WHERE weight < 500 ORDER BY distance ASC
SELECT SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM transportation_costs
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM parameters WHERE parameter_name LIKE '%weight%'
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE cost > (SELECT AVG(cost) FROM transportation_costs)
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT route, weight FROM transportation_costs WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY route ASC;
SELECT route, distance FROM transportation_costs WHERE distance < 500 AND route LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT * FROM distance_matrix WHERE source_location = 'CityA' AND destination_location = 'CityB';
SELECT id, type, weight_capacity FROM vehicle_types WHERE weight_capacity > 500 ORDER BY weight_capacity DESC;
SELECT id, route, distance, weight FROM transportation_costs WHERE weight > 100 AND distance < 500 ORDER BY distance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT route, distance, weight FROM transportation_costs WHERE route ILIKE 'A%' ORDER BY route ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT source_location, destination_location, distance FROM distance_matrix WHERE distance BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY distance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_types WHERE weight_capacity > 200 AND fuel_efficiency > 15 ORDER BY fuel_efficiency DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT type, fuel_efficiency FROM vehicle_types WHERE type IN ('Truck', 'SUV', 'Van') ORDER BY type ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes;
SELECT route_id, distance, cost_per_mile FROM transportation_routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT vehicle_name, capacity, fuel_type FROM transport_vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipping_orders WHERE requested_delivery_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT route_id, cost_per_mile, total_cost FROM transportation_routes JOIN transport_costs ON transportation_routes.route_id = transport_costs.route_id;
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes WHERE distance > 1000
SELECT route_id, distance, cost_per_mile FROM transportation_routes WHERE weight < 200
SELECT vehicle_name, SUM(total_cost) AS total_cost FROM transport_vehicles JOIN transport_costs ON transport_vehicles.vehicle_id = transport_costs.vehicle_id GROUP BY vehicle_name
SELECT order_id, vehicle_name, requested_delivery_date FROM shipping_orders JOIN transport_vehicles ON shipping_orders.vehicle_id = transport_vehicles.vehicle_id
SELECT transport_vehicles.vehicle_name, transport_costs.total_cost FROM transport_vehicles JOIN transport_costs ON transport_vehicles.vehicle_id = transport_costs.vehicle_id ORDER BY total_cost DESC
SELECT * FROM distances;
SELECT id, source_location, destination_location FROM distances ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT SUM(distance) AS total_distance FROM distances WHERE source_location='City A';
SELECT destination_location, distance FROM distances WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT source_location, destination_location, distance FROM distances WHERE source_location='City B' AND distance < 200;
SELECT * FROM distances WHERE distance > 100
SELECT source_location, destination_location FROM distances WHERE source_location = 'City A'
SELECT SUM(distance) AS total_distance FROM distances
SELECT item_name, weight FROM weights WHERE weight >= 2.5 ORDER BY weight DESC
SELECT vehicle_name, capacity FROM vehicles WHERE capacity BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY capacity ASC
